title: About Me
description: Over the past year, I’ve enhanced my expertise in fullstack development, cloud computing, and modern web technologies, creating scalable and user-friendly applications that drive tangible results for businesses. My background combines a Higher Diploma in Computer Science with a Bachelor’s Degree in Digital Marketing, giving me a unique edge in understanding both the technical and strategic aspects of web development.

I’ve held professional roles at AWS and Meta, where I refined my problem-solving and troubleshooting abilities by providing technical customer support and delivering effective solutions for global clients. In my freelance work, I’ve completed numerous projects focused on building responsive, high-performing web applications, ensuring optimal user experience and SEO best practices.

profile.name: Nelson
profile.role: Full Stack Developer and Web Designer
